description: This course is designed for beginners who want to learn the fundamentals of programming. Starting with basic concepts, students will progress through topics such as variables, control flow, and functions. By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation in programming.
dailyBreakdown: Day 3-4: Understanding Variables and Data Types
Day 5-6: Control Flow and Decision Making

description: This intensive bootcamp covers the essentials of web development. From building static web pages with HTML and styling them using CSS to dynamic client-side interactions with JavaScript, and server-side development with Node.js. The course concludes with a deep dive into React for building modern, interactive web applications.
dailyBreakdown: Week 3-4: Introduction to JavaScript and DOM Manipulation
Week 7-8: React Basics and Component-Based Architecture
Week 9-10: Advanced React Concepts and Project Work

description: Explore the world of data science with this comprehensive course. Starting with statistical concepts, participants will learn to use Python for data analysis and manipulation. The course delves into machine learning, covering algorithms and techniques for extracting meaningful insights from data.
dailyBreakdown: Week 1-2: Statistical Concepts and Data Exploration
Week 3-4: Introduction to Python for Data Science
Week 5-6: Data Analysis Techniques and Visualization
Week 9-10: Advanced Machine Learning Concepts and Practical Applications

description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level with this advanced course. Explore the latest features of ECMAScript 6 (ES6+), understand asynchronous programming, master the concept of closures, and dive deep into working with promises. By the end, participants will have a strong grasp of advanced JavaScript concepts.
dailyBreakdown: Week 1-2: Exploring ES6+ Features and Enhancements
Week 3-4: Asynchronous JavaScript and Event Loop
Week 7-8: Deep Dive into Promises and Asynchronous Patterns
